name: The Vampire's Grave
description:
This game was completed for Kenny Jam 2020: but not submitted since i missed the deadline by 3 minutes. https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2020

All assets made By Kenny. 

The Altar has been activated, and, the graveyard is now crawling with zombies. 

Collect the 3 cursed artifacts to Seal the gateway
